0.3.name: wordpress/ebay-sales-lister
0.3.description: The Ebay Sales Lister is a WordPress plugin that lets you display a list of ebay auctions/sales on your WordPress blog. Your ebay auctions will be presented with their title, the remaining time and the current bid in the sidebar of your blog. Therefore you will need to use a WordPress theme that provides you with a sidebar. (Note: You can of course display the ebay auctions for any ebay username, so it does not necessarily have to be yours.)
